228557.「メレアーデ様！\n <pc>から 聞きましたぞ！！:
Miss Mereade! I just heard from
<pc>!

228559.「時見のカギを 慰霊碑に納めたいとは\n どういうことなのですか！？:
What do you mean you want to put the Timeseer
Key inside the memorial?!

228563.「時見のカギは エテーネ王家の象徴。\n まさか 王制を廃止しようなどと\n 思:
The Timeseer Key is the symbol of the Royal
House of Ethene. You're not thinking of
abolishing our monarchy, are you?

228565.「そんなことをすれば\n 今は亡き クオード陛下が\n どれだけ おなげきになる:
His Majesty Quard would be appalled by such
an idea if he were still here!

228573.<center>姉……さん…………。\nどうか…… エテーネ王国を……\n新しい:
Sis...ter... Please...
Lead the... Kingdom of Ethene...
...into a new... future...

228581.「メ メレアーデ様！！\n おぐしの色が 以前のものに 戻っております！:
M-miss Mereade!! Your hair color has changed
back to normal!

228583.「こ……これは！！\n クオード陛下の ご遺志が起こした奇跡に\n ちがいない！:
It... it must be a miracle brought upon by
His Majesty's will!

228585.「……エテーネルキューブが\n クオードの思いを 伝えてくれたのね。:
...I felt Quard's thoughts through the
Ethenel Cube.

228587.「時見のカギを 慰霊碑に納めたいと言ったのは\n 私たちが 時見のチカラに頼らず:
The reason for wanting to put the Timeseer Key
in the memorial was to show that we don't have
to rely on the Timeseer Box's power anymore.

228589.「それは きっと クオードの望んだ\n 新しい未来へ 歩みだすために必要なことで:
I'm sure that's what it will take to head
towards the future that Quard wanted. You
understand, don't you, Theodort?

228591.「先ほどの非礼……どうか お許しください。\n あなた様のご意志は クオード陛下:
Please forgive my rudeness from before. Your
will is His Majesty's will. I'll never
forget that.

228593.「このセオドルト。一命を賭して\n エテーネ王国の未来のため メレアーデ様の\n:
I, Theodort, will give my life for you to
help you achieve the Ethene Kingdom's future!

228595.「取り急ぎ 慰霊碑の完成を目指さなくては。\n 手配は すでに 済ませております:
We must work quickly to finish the memorial.
The arrangements have been made, and now all
that's left is a matter of placing it!

228597.「わかりました。慰霊碑が完成したら\n クオードの死を 国民に伝えるつもりですの:
Understood. When the memorial is finished, I
will tell everyone the news of Quard's death.

228601.セオドルトの指揮のもと 大急ぎで\n慰霊碑の建造が 進められていった。:
Under Theodort's leadership, the memorial's
construction proceeded with utmost haste.

228603.ほどなくして 慰霊碑は完成し\nそのお披露目の式典が 国民を集めて\nおこなわれ:
Soon after, the construction was completed
and a ceremony was held to unveil it to
the public.

228605.式典の場で メレアーデによって\nクオードの死を告げられた 王国の民は\n動揺を:
When Mereade broke the news of Quard's death,
there was much commotion about the people
of Ethene...

228607.時見のチカラに頼ることなく 自分たちの足で\n新たな未来へ歩みだそうと 強く語る:
However, Mereade's words about not relying on
the power of the Timeseer and moving towards a
new future restored the people's hope.

245654.「……皆さん自身の足で\n 輝かしい未来へと 歩みだしましょう。\n エテーネ王:
...Let us begin our journey to a new future
with our own two feet.
Ethene Kingdom, forever!
